interface.name: Notification
interface.javadoc:
A notification from the SCTP stack.

Objects of this type are passed to the {@link NotificationHandler} when a notification is received.

An SCTP channel supports the following notifications: {@link AssociationChangeNotification}, {@link PeerAddressChangeNotification},{@link SendFailedNotification}, {@link ShutdownNotification}, and may support additional implementation specific notifications. 1.7
Returns the association that this notification is applicable to.
